L

Level - com.topcoder.util.log 中的 枚举
描述log的等级枚举，参看log4j的level
Log - com.topcoder.util.log 中的 接口
自定义logger的接口
log(Level, String) - 接口 com.topcoder.util.log.Log 中的方法
 
Log4jUtility - com.topcoder.commons.utils 中的 类
This is a utility class that provides static methods for logging method entrance, method exit and exception using Log4j library.
logEntrance(Logger, String, String[], Object[]) - 类 com.topcoder.commons.utils.Log4jUtility 中的静态方法
Logs the method entrance together with input parameters (if present).
logEntrance(Logger, String, String[], Object[], Level) - 类 com.topcoder.commons.utils.Log4jUtility 中的静态方法
Logs the method entrance together with input parameters (if present) and timestamp (optionally).
logEntrance(Log, String, String[], Object[]) - 类 com.topcoder.commons.utils.LoggingWrapperUtility 中的静态方法
Logs the method entrance together with input parameters (if present).
logEntrance(Log, String, String[], Object[], boolean, Level) - 类 com.topcoder.commons.utils.LoggingWrapperUtility 中的静态方法
Logs the method entrance together with input parameters (if present) and timestamp (optionally).
logException(Logger, String, T) - 类 com.topcoder.commons.utils.Log4jUtility 中的静态方法
Logs the given exception.
logException(Logger, String, T, Level) - 类 com.topcoder.commons.utils.Log4jUtility 中的静态方法
Logs the given exception using the specified priority.
logException(Log, String, T) - 类 com.topcoder.commons.utils.LoggingWrapperUtility 中的静态方法
Logs the given exception.
logException(Log, String, T, boolean, Level) - 类 com.topcoder.commons.utils.LoggingWrapperUtility 中的静态方法
Logs the given exception together with timestamp (optionally).
logExit(Logger, String, Object[]) - 类 com.topcoder.commons.utils.Log4jUtility 中的静态方法
Logs the method exit together with the returned value (if present).
logExit(Logger, String, Object[], Date) - 类 com.topcoder.commons.utils.Log4jUtility 中的静态方法
Logs the method exit together with the returned value (if present) and method execution time.
logExit(Logger, String, Object[], Date, Level) - 类 com.topcoder.commons.utils.Log4jUtility 中的静态方法
Logs the method exit together with the returned value (if present) and method execution time.
logExit(Log, String, Object[]) - 类 com.topcoder.commons.utils.LoggingWrapperUtility 中的静态方法
Logs the method exit together with the returned value (if present).
logExit(Log, String, Object[], Date) - 类 com.topcoder.commons.utils.LoggingWrapperUtility 中的静态方法
Logs the method exit together with the returned value (if present) and method execution time.
logExit(Log, String, Object[], Date, boolean, Level) - 类 com.topcoder.commons.utils.LoggingWrapperUtility 中的静态方法
Logs the method exit together with the returned value (if present) and method execution time.
LoggingWrapperUtility - com.topcoder.commons.utils 中的 类
This is a utility class that provides static methods for logging method entrance, method exit and exception using Logging Wrapper component.
